item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Its time for the last downhill listing for this group.

I have chosen Berkshire East for this event.

http://www.berkshireeast.com/home.html

 

Berskhire East Ski Resort

66 Thunder Mountain Road

Charlemont, MA 01339

 

 

I will leave The Hartford area at 4 :00 pm exactly.

Tickets for the evening are on sale at 5:45 pm and evening skiing is from 6pm to 9 pm.

(Just enough time to get in the last blast) Yes its a long drive and you come home late..

$10 Thursday Night

 

6:00-9:00 pm

$10 Lift, $10 Rental, $10 Helmet


No sales before 5:45pm!

Sorry, no Lessons on March 14, 2013

see those that are interested.

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing my BRIGHT ORANGE HUNTING HAT while on the slopes and or Lodge area

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Last Downhill Ski event for this group @ Birkshire East
